channel.title: What is required to host a sever on a dedicated server
channel.description:
Well I own a server (not being used by anything) it has 4gb ram and 2 duel core optys... I am wondering what is required for me to host a private server on that said dedicated. I want a 24/7 server and that is the only way for me... btw it is linux. Is there a tutorial on how to do this? I am very interested.
Thank you very much for your help

item.title: What is required to host a sever on a dedicated server

@ham8legs wrote:

Some whos not talking S***

item.title: What is required to host a sever on a dedicated server
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“ham8legs, post:14, topic:158553”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=216063.msg1947280#msg1947280 date=1198383368]
Upload the your server to the actual server, connect to the server through ssh - cd to the dir that the server is in. then type ‘java server’.
[/quote]

That makes my day! LOL![/quote]
Why does it?

Read full topic

Just run your server like you would on your personal PC.[/quote]That’s not even close to what Mopar uses. He uses 750GB of bandwith every month hosting the webclient at www.moparisthebest.com
